title: Cursed Soul

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a 50% chance of targeting the player you chose and a 50% chance of targeting a random player.
- You will swap role names, numbers, abilities and attributes with your target, but not alignment or win condition.
- You cannot swap with Neutrals other than roles that must kill all who oppose them.
- If you do not select a target, one will be chosen for you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see all Cursed Soul *roles* die.

desc:
Post 5318
*honestly the change to goal is kinda cool*
